citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1430 on
25-Apr-19.
Inspector knocked at front door, no answer. Phone number on file was called, no response, no message able to be
left. Inspector waited 30 minutes before leaving.

narrative:

ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
